featured.text: Sullivan, while surveying a campground, felt that a cloud was 24 him, and tried all he could to run— but it got him anyway.
33 , there are lovely, clean campgrounds where campers can park their vehicles.

definition.zh_def: 露營地，供露營者搭帳篷或停放露營車的地方。
definition.en_def: A designated area for camping, where people can set up tents or park recreational vehicles.
definition.example: We spent the weekend at a beautiful campground by the lake.
